mapper.select: SELECT r.* FROM admin_role_relation arr, role r WHERE arr.role_id = r.id AND arr.admin_id= #{adminId}

SELECT DISTINCT r.create_time, r.`name`, r.id, r.url, r.description, r.category_id FROM role_resource_relation rr, resource r, role, admin_role_relation admin_role, admin WHERE rr.resource_id = r.id AND rr.role_id = role.id AND rr.role_id = admin_role.role_id AND admin_role.admin_id = admin.id AND admin_id=#{adminId}

SELECT DISTINCT m.create_time, m.hidden, m.icon, m.id, m.`level`, m.`name`, m.parent_id, m.sort, m.title FROM role_menu_relation rmr, menu m, role r, admin_role_relation arr, admin a WHERE rmr.menu_id = m.id AND rmr.role_id = r.id AND arr.role_id = r.id AND arr.admin_id = a.id AND admin_id =#{adminId}
